body_html:
HI @arekaykay

I have a strange problem with tensorflow in python3.5. I have cudnn 5.1 in my cuda directory, but tensorflow always complain the following,

ImportError: libcudnn.so.6: cannot open shared object file: No such file or directory

I tried to reinstall tensorflow 1.3, but this does not solve my problem.

I have also tried to create a symbolic link to libcudnn.so.6 by the following,

sudo ln -s libcudnn.so.5.1.10 libcudnn.so.6

Although the link was created successfully, but tensorflow still complain the same thing as shown above.
SO why tensorflow complains not be able to use cudnn 6 when I have cudnn5.1 installed?

THanks a lot.
